main.title: Overview
main.body: Homely has a target customer base of amateurs: regular people who sometimes need to access tools for a specific, fairly straightforward DIY task, such as assembling a cabinet, putting up a shelf, or repotting one of your plants.

main.title: The brief
main.body: For this customer base, buying the tools outright seems unnecessary. Renting the tools, on the other hand, is cheaper, less wasteful, and saves space in their home. Therefore, the main feature of Homely is the Toolkit Rental option. These pre-composed toolkits include everything the user needs for the task. Toolkits are stored in lockers located around the city and inside big homeware stores.

main.title: The solution
main.body: An app that provides a dedicated section to search task edicated tookits resources. A s section to see previous accompished tasks and the opportunity to reorder the same toolkit.

listItems.title: Toolkit
listItems.description: The user can search for and rent tools or receive suggestions based on their DIY task.

listItems.title: My rentals
listItems.description: This is where the user can manage their rentals past, present, and future, including repeating previous rentals and changing rental return dates.

listItems.title: Account
listItems.description: This is where the user can update their payment methods and notifications.

listItems.title: Lockers
listItems.description: This is where a map shows the user the nearest rental stores and lockers to their location.
